mapper.select: select ors.official_rank_system_name, ors.rank_prefix_code, p.post_id, p.post_code, p.post_name, p.official_rank_system_id, case when ors.rank_prefix_code is null then p.post_rank_lower when ors.rank_prefix_code is not null then concat(ors.rank_prefix_code, p.post_rank_lower) end as post_rank_lower_name, case when ors.rank_prefix_code is null then p.post_rank_upper when ors.rank_prefix_code is not null then concat(ors.rank_prefix_code, p.post_rank_upper) end as post_rank_upper_name, case when ors.rank_prefix_code is null then p.post_rank when ors.rank_prefix_code is not null then concat(ors.rank_prefix_code, p.post_rank) end as post_rank_name, p.post_rank_lower, p.post_rank_upper, p.post_rank, p.post_description, p.status, p.delete_flag, p.create_by, p.create_time, p.update_by, p.update_time from post p left join official_rank_system ors on p.official_rank_system_id = ors.official_rank_system_id and ors.delete_flag = 0 where p.delete_flag = 0 and p.post_id = #{postId}

select ors.official_rank_system_name, ors.rank_prefix_code, p.post_id, p.post_code, p.post_name, p.official_rank_system_id, p.post_rank_lower, p.post_rank_upper, p.post_rank, case when ors.rank_prefix_code is null then p.post_rank_lower when ors.rank_prefix_code is not null then concat(ors.rank_prefix_code,p.post_rank_lower) end as post_rank_lower_name, case when ors.rank_prefix_code is null then p.post_rank_upper when ors.rank_prefix_code is not null then concat(ors.rank_prefix_code,p.post_rank_upper) end as post_rank_upper_name, case when ors.rank_prefix_code is null then p.post_rank when ors.rank_prefix_code is not null then concat(ors.rank_prefix_code,p.post_rank) end as post_rank_name, p.post_description, p.status, p.delete_flag, p.create_by, p.create_time, p.update_by, p.update_time from post p left join official_rank_system ors on p.official_rank_system_id = ors .official_rank_system_id and ors .delete_flag = 0
where p.delete_flag = 0
AND p.post_code IN
#{item}
AND (p.post_code NOT IN
#{item}
OR p.post_code IS NULL )
AND ( p.post_code LIKE concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
AND
p.post_code NOT LIKE concat('%', #{item}, '%')
AND p.post_name IN
#{item}
AND (p.post_name NOT IN
#{item}
OR p.post_name IS NULL )
AND ( p.post_name LIKE concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
AND
p.post_name NOT LIKE concat('%', #{item}, '%')
AND ors.official_rank_system_name IN
#{item}
AND (ors.official_rank_system_name NOT IN
#{item}
OR ors.official_rank_system_name IS NULL )
AND case when ors.rank_prefix_code is null then p.post_rank when ors.rank_prefix_code is not null then concat(ors.rank_prefix_code,p.post_rank) end IN
#{item}
AND (case when ors.rank_prefix_code is null then p.post_rank when ors.rank_prefix_code is not null then concat(ors.rank_prefix_code,p.post_rank) end NOT IN
#{item}
OR case when ors.rank_prefix_code is null then p.post_rank when ors.rank_prefix_code is not null then concat(ors.rank_prefix_code,p.post_rank) end IS NULL )
AND ( case when ors.rank_prefix_code is null then p.post_rank when ors.rank_prefix_code is not null then concat(ors.rank_prefix_code,p.post_rank) end LIKE concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
AND
case when ors.rank_prefix_code is null then p.post_rank when ors.rank_prefix_code is not null then concat(ors.rank_prefix_code,p.post_rank) end NOT LIKE concat('%', #{item}, '%')
AND case when ors.rank_prefix_code is null then p.post_rank_upper when ors.rank_prefix_code is not null then concat(ors.rank_prefix_code,p.post_rank_upper) end IN
#{item}
AND (case when ors.rank_prefix_code is null then p.post_rank_upper when ors.rank_prefix_code is not null then concat(ors.rank_prefix_code,p.post_rank_upper) end NOT IN
#{item}
OR case when ors.rank_prefix_code is null then p.post_rank_upper when ors.rank_prefix_code is not null then concat(ors.rank_prefix_code,p.post_rank_upper) end IS NULL )
AND ( case when ors.rank_prefix_code is null then p.post_rank_upper when ors.rank_prefix_code is not null then concat(ors.rank_prefix_code,p.post_rank_upper) end LIKE concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
AND
case when ors.rank_prefix_code is null then p.post_rank_upper when ors.rank_prefix_code is not null then concat(ors.rank_prefix_code,p.post_rank_upper) end NOT LIKE concat('%', #{item}, '%')
AND case when ors.rank_prefix_code is null then p.post_rank_lower when ors.rank_prefix_code is not null then concat(ors.rank_prefix_code,p.post_rank_lower) end IN
#{item}
AND (case when ors.rank_prefix_code is null then p.post_rank_lower when ors.rank_prefix_code is not null then concat(ors.rank_prefix_code,p.post_rank_lower) end NOT IN
#{item}
OR case when ors.rank_prefix_code is null then p.post_rank_lower when ors.rank_prefix_code is not null then concat(ors.rank_prefix_code,p.post_rank_lower) end IS NULL )
AND ( case when ors.rank_prefix_code is null then p.post_rank_lower when ors.rank_prefix_code is not null then concat(ors.rank_prefix_code,p.post_rank_lower) end LIKE concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
AND
case when ors.rank_prefix_code is null then p.post_rank_lower when ors.rank_prefix_code is not null then concat(ors.rank_prefix_code,p.post_rank_lower) end NOT LIKE concat('%', #{item}, '%')
AND p.status IN
#{item}
AND (p.status NOT IN
#{item}
OR p.status IS NULL )
and ors.official_rank_system_name like '%${post.officialRankSystemName}%'
and p.post_id like '%${post.postId}%'
and p.post_code like '%${post.postCode}%'
and p.post_name like '%${post.postName}%'
and p.official_rank_system_id like '%${post.officialRankSystemId}%'
and case when ors.rank_prefix_code is null then p.post_rank_lower when ors.rank_prefix_code is not null then concat(ors.rank_prefix_code,p.post_rank_lower) end like '%${post.postRankLowerName}%'
and case when ors.rank_prefix_code is null then p.post_rank_upper when ors.rank_prefix_code is not null then concat(ors.rank_prefix_code,p.post_rank_upper) end like '%${post.postRankName}%'
and case when ors.rank_prefix_code is null then p.post_rank when ors.rank_prefix_code is not null then concat(ors.rank_prefix_code,p.post_rank) end like '%${post.postRankUpperName}%'
and p.post_description like '%${post.postDescription}%'
and p.status =#{post.status}
order by p.create_time desc
SELECT post_code FROM post WHERE delete_flag = 0 AND post_code LIKE CONCAT(#{prefixCodeRule}, '%') ORDER BY post_code ASC

SELECT post_id, post_code, post_name, official_rank_system_id, post_rank_lower, post_rank, post_rank_upper, post_description, status, delete_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time FROM post WHERE BINARY post_code = #{postCode} and delete_flag = 0

SELECT post_id, post_code, post_name, official_rank_system_id, post_rank_lower, post_rank, post_rank_upper, post_description, status, delete_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time FROM post WHERE post_name = #{postName} and delete_flag = 0

select d.department_id , p.post_id, p.post_code, p.post_name, p.official_rank_system_id, p.post_rank_lower, p.post_rank, p.post_rank_upper, p.post_description, p.status, p.delete_flag, p.create_by, p.create_time, p.update_by, p.update_time from department d left join department_post dp on dp.department_id = d.department_id and dp.delete_flag =0 left join post p on p.post_id =dp.post_id and p.delete_flag =0 where d.delete_flag =0
and d.department_id = #{departmentId}

select ors.official_rank_system_name, ors.rank_prefix_code, p.post_id, p.post_code, p.post_name, p.official_rank_system_id, p.post_rank_lower, p.post_rank_upper, p.post_rank, case when ors.rank_prefix_code is null then p.post_rank_lower when ors.rank_prefix_code is not null then concat(ors.rank_prefix_code, p.post_rank_lower) end as post_rank_lower_name, case when ors.rank_prefix_code is null then p.post_rank_upper when ors.rank_prefix_code is not null then concat(ors.rank_prefix_code, p.post_rank_upper) end as post_rank_upper_name, case when ors.rank_prefix_code is null then p.post_rank when ors.rank_prefix_code is not null then concat(ors.rank_prefix_code, p.post_rank) end as post_rank_name, p.post_description, p.status, p.delete_flag, p.create_by, p.create_time, p.update_by, p.update_time from post p left join official_rank_system ors on p.official_rank_system_id = ors.official_rank_system_id and ors.delete_flag = 0 where p.delete_flag = 0 and p.official_rank_system_id = #{officialRankSystemId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (post_code, post_name, official_rank_system_id, post_rank_lower, post_rank, post_rank_upper, post_description, status, delete_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) VALUES (#{post.postCode}, #{post.postName}, #{post.officialRankSystemId}, #{post.postRankLower}, #{post.postRank}, #{post.postRankUpper}, #{post.postDescription}, #{post.status}, #{post.deleteFlag}, #{post.createBy}, #{post.createTime}, #{post.updateBy}, #{post.updateTime})
mapper.update:
UPDATE post SET
post_code=#{post.postCode},
post_name=#{post.postName},
official_rank_system_id=#{post.officialRankSystemId},
post_rank_lower=#{post.postRankLower},
post_rank=#{post.postRank},
post_rank_upper=#{post.postRankUpper},
post_description=#{post.postDescription},
status=#{post.status},
delete_flag=#{post.deleteFlag},
create_by=#{post.createBy},
create_time=#{post.createTime},
update_by=#{post.updateBy},
update_time=#{post.updateTime}
WHERE post_id=#{post.postId}

UPDATE post SET delete_flag= 1, update_by=#{updateBy}, update_time=#{updateTime} WHERE post_id IN
#{item}
